caption.p: Antioxidant activities of PPEO. ( A) 1,1-Dipheny-2-Picryhydrazyl (DPPH) radical scavenging assay; ( B) superoxide anion radical scavenging activity assay; ( C) 2,2â€²-azinobis-(3-ethylbenzthiazoline-6-sulphonate) (ABTS) total antioxidant activity. * Indicates samples that are significantly different ( n = 3; * p < 0.05 and ** p < 0.01 compared with the positive control group).
